module.name: postureBabbler
module.description: Just iterate randomly between a set of prerecorded postures, going back to "safe" in between. Makes use of the ctpService.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Move the left and right arm independently among a set of pre-recorded postures (app/imitationBabbling/conf). \n

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
The stem name of the postures (e.g babbling_0 babbling_1 etc would have babbling_ as a stem name) /name
The time that will be passed to the ctpService for reaching the posture. /name
Name of the posture to be reached in between two random postures. /name
